original_text: that you shall be driven from among men, and your dwelling shall be with the beasts of the field. You shall be made to eat grass like an ox, and you shall be wet with the dew of heaven, and seven periods of time shall pass over you, till you know that the Most High rules the kingdom of men and gives it to whom he will.
korean_text: 왕이 사람에게서 쫓겨나서 들짐승과 함께 살며 소처럼 풀을 먹으며 하늘 이슬에 젖을 것이요 이와 같이 일곱 때를 지낼 것이라 그 때에 지극히 높으신 이가 사람의 나라를 다스리시며 자기의 뜻대로 그것을 누구에게든지 주시는 줄을 아시리이다

sentences.original_text: that you shall be driven from among men
and your dwelling shall be with the beasts of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 네 거처는 들의 짐승들과 함께 있을 것이라

sentences.original_text: You shall be made to eat grass like an ox
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 소처럼 풀을 먹게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and you shall be wet with the dew of heaven
and seven periods of time shall pass over you
till you know that the Most High rules the kingdom of men
sentences.korean_translation: 지존자가 인간의 나라를 다스리심을 네가 알 때까지

sentences.original_text: and gives it to whom he will
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 원하는 자에게 그것을 주심을
